Meta.title: Cat-Ching of Traps
Meta.author: Tomy
Meta.description: [h1]Overview[/h1] Adds a new religion, [b]“Cat-Ching of Traps.”[/b] This faith grants techniques for making the most of traps. [h1]Details[/h1] [h2]Offerings[/h2] [list][*]Corpse [*]Stone [*]Sake barrel [/list] [h2]Passive[/h2] [list][*]Perception [*]Spot Hidden [*]Disarm Trap [/list] [h2]Bonuses[/h2] [list][*]Allows the worshipper to see traps. [*]Increases the number of traps that appear in Nefia dungeons. [/list] [h2]Rewards[/h2] [spoiler] [olist][*]Karakuroid (Pet) [*]Trapper's Bracelet (Artifact) [/olist] [h3]Nine-Lives Bakeneko[/h3] [list][*]Possesses the feat Arcane Core 1. [*]Can use Gravity and Drop Trap. [*]Drop Trap places a random trap beneath its feet. [/list] [h3]Trapper's Bracelet[/h3] [list][*]Includes a faction enchantment that enables the detection, avoidance, and utilization of traps. [/list] [/spoiler] [h2]Altars[/h2] After installing this mod, additional Trap Altars will appear among the altars placed in the fields and in Nefia.
